item.title: Value Line
item.description: I first heard of The Value Line from James Watters in a presentation about Cloud Foundry and how Cloud Foundry helps keep a companies most valuable asset, People, above the value line, out of toil, and innovating business value. The Value Line is a great thinking tool. The Value Line is similar to another idea from Geoffery Moore, "Core vs Context" in his book Dealing with Darwin. "The Value Line" and "Core vs Context" combine to create a thinking framework.
